trans-unit.source: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.
trans-unit.target: 表示在 XQuery 1.0 和 XPath 2.0 数据模型中的项。

trans-unit.source: An item is either a node or an atomic value.
trans-unit.target: 项是节点或一个原子值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类构造函数来初始化此类型中的状态将调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the item represents an XPath node or an atomic value.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取一个值，该值指示该项是否表示一个 XPath 节点或一个原子值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item represents an XPath node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the item represents an atomic value.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该项表示一个 XPath 节点;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果该项表示一个原子值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，作为最合适的装箱对象获取的当前项[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]根据其架构类型的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the TypedValue property is equivalent to the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果项的值相对于其指定的架构类型无效，TypedValue 属性的值的值等效<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.
trans-unit.target: 作为最合适的装箱对象的当前项[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]类型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the item.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>项的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>项的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item's value as the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的类型的项的值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，ValueAs 方法尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]指定类型。

trans-unit.source: The type to return the item value as.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的项值的类型。

trans-unit.source: The value of the item as the type requested.
trans-unit.target: 请求的类型作为项的值。

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
trans-unit.target: 项的值不在目标类型的正确格式。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换无效。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换会导致溢出。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时返回项的值为使用指定的类型<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>对象指定用来解析命名空间前缀。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，ValueAs 方法尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]指定类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>对象用于解析与类型转换有关的命名空间前缀。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，转换时`xs:QName`到`xs:string`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The type to return the item's value as.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的项的值的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object used to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>对象用于解析命名空间前缀。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: The value of the item as the type requested.
trans-unit.target: 请求的类型作为项的值。

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
trans-unit.target: 项的值不在目标类型的正确格式。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换无效。

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换会导致溢出。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取作为一种<xref:System.Boolean>。</xref:System.Boolean>项的值

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Boolean> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A>属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]<xref:System.Boolean>根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。</xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The item's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 作为一种<xref:System.Boolean>。</xref:System.Boolean>的项的值

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Boolean> type.
trans-unit.target: 项的值不正确的格式为<xref:System.Boolean>类型。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Boolean> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换为<xref:System.Boolean>无效。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取作为一种<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>项的值

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsDateTime property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.DateTime> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: ValueAsDateTime 属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]<xref:System.DateTime>根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The item's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 作为一种<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>的项的值

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.DateTime> type.
trans-unit.target: 项的值不正确的格式为<xref:System.DateTime>类型。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.DateTime> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换为<xref:System.DateTime>无效。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取作为一种<xref:System.Double>。</xref:System.Double>项的值

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsDouble property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Double> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: ValueAsDouble 属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]<xref:System.Double>根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The item's value as a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 作为一种<xref:System.Double>。</xref:System.Double>的项的值

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Double> type.
trans-unit.target: 项的值不正确的格式为<xref:System.Double>类型。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Double> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换为<xref:System.Double>无效。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换会导致溢出。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取作为<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>项的值

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsInt property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int32> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: ValueAsInt 属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]<xref:System.Int32>根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The item's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 为<xref:System.Int32>。</xref:System.Int32>的项的值

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int32> type.
trans-unit.target: 项的值不正确的格式为<xref:System.Int32>类型。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int32> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换为<xref:System.Int32>无效。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换会导致溢出。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取作为<xref:System.Int64>.</xref:System.Int64>项的值

trans-unit.source: The ValueAsLong property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int64> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
trans-unit.target: ValueAsLong 属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]<xref:System.Int64>根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The item's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.
trans-unit.target: 为<xref:System.Int64>。</xref:System.Int64>的项的值

trans-unit.source: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int64> type.
trans-unit.target: 项的值不正确的格式为<xref:System.Int64>类型。</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int64> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换为<xref:System.Int64>无效。</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
trans-unit.target: 尝试强制转换会导致溢出。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]的项类型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the ValueType property gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the typed value of the item.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，ValueType 属性获取[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的项的类型化值的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a ValueType of <xref:System.Int32> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，类型的元素`xs:int`将具有的 ValueType<xref:System.Int32>默认情况下。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: However, the ValueType could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，ValueType 可能是任何一种可以映射到有效类型`xs:int`，如<xref:System.Int16>或<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Int16>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型的详细信息，支持在<xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的项类型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the item.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref>项。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the XmlType property gets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> for the item.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取 xml 类型属性<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType>项。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType>或<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"> </xref>项。
